version_description:
- New user-friendly design
- New features
- Fixes and performance improvement

- Bug fixes
- UI improvements

The Aramex app has been redesigned so that you can manage your delivery experience through your phone:

• Quick and secure one-time sign-in with your mobile number to see all your shipments in one place

• See full payment breakdowns including customs charges

• Manage your account and addresses, share your location with the courier

• Schedule personalised deliveries in app, choose a delivery to home or work at your preferred date and time

• Push notifications - receive notifications on important shipment updates. No need to check the app to monitor progress, let us notify you.

• Fixed a bug that forces some users to sign in again.

• Other bug fixes and improvements to performance and functionality.

• Payments - choose to pay for your shipments in app, no need to pay cash to the courier.

• Rating – rate your recent delivery experience, tell us what can we improve.

• Other bug fixes and improvements.

• Improvements for reliability and speed
• Refining map searching experience
• Fixes and enhancements

• Rate Calculator feature. Now you can find the price and time of your delivery with different delivery options that are available for your location and also schedule your delivery via calling your local aramex branch to have your shipment picked up by an aramex courier.
• Primary Address feature. Select your primary address to have all your aramex shipments delivered to.
• Design improvements, miscellaneous bug fixes and enhancements.

• Pickup from locker feature: introducing a new delivery option where you can receive your shipment securely at your most convenient Aramex locker in your city and pick it up from there.
• Design improvements, functionality enhancements and miscellaneous bug fixes.

• You can now track the shipments you have sent.
• When a shipment is delivered, the name of the person who received the shipment will appear on the shipment details.
• New notifications have been added to support the outgoing shipments feature 
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

• QR Code for Lockers feature. Once your shipment is ready at a locker, you will be able to easily collect your shipment by just scanning the QR Code that will appear in the app’s shipment details screen.
• Miscellaneous design improvements, bug fixes and performance enhancements

* Scheduling Pickup: now you can easily send any shipment from your Aramex app by scheduling a pickup request from your doorstep and our courier will come to pick it up at your preferred time.

* Miscellaneous design improvements, bug fixes and performance enhancements
Miscellaneous design improvements, bug fixes and performance enhancements

- live track your couriers during pickup and delivery
- easily rate the pickup service
- enjoy other small improvement and bug fixes

• Added Help and support section: you can now check our FAQs and contact our customer service team for any issues.
• Introduced personalized delivery options
• Started showing the break times for the aramex outlets
• Miscellaneous fixes and enhancements
• Enhanced our PayPal experience so we make sure payments are done successfully

- We are now integrating with What3Words to provide our customers with an easy and accurate way to identify their addresses
- We have done several enhancements on the app design to guarantee the best experience for our customers
- Bug fixes

• Create a support request with your question or issue while checking your shipment
• Stay on top of updates to your support requests
• Major design improvements
• Miscellaneous bug fixes

Stay tuned for our exciting updates...

• New payment settings: you can now securely navigate to your saved credit cards from your account section and easily manage them to smoothen your payment experience.
• Enjoy the new designs of your shipments list and details
• miscellaneous bug fixes and design enhancements

• Enhancements on our customer support section to help better interactivity with our customers
• You can now easily change the email linked to your profile from My Account section
• You can now see your supplier tracking number along with your shipment details
• Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes

• You can now use What3Words™ on every map screen to quickly identify the needed address.
• Tried to log in but didn’t receive our SMS verification code? We have introduced the 'Request a call' feature to make sure you get it.
• Easily change email address associated with your account with our Unlink Email Feature
• You can easily copy tracking number from the shipment details screen menu
• Enjoy miscellaneous design enhancements and bug fixes.

• You can now use What3Words™ on every map screen to quickly identify the needed address.
• Tried to log in but didn’t receive our SMS verification code? We have introduced the 'Request a call' feature to make sure you get it.
• Easily change email address associated with your account with our Unlink Email Feature
• You can easily copy tracking number from the shipment details screen menu
• Enjoy miscellaneous design enhancements and bug fixes.
Fixed the crash that happens when signing into the app

• Added support for iOS 11 and iPhone 10.
• We have reduced the app size to 50%.
• Ability to edit existing credit cards.
• Ability to remove saved addresses.
• Improvements and bug fixes.

• Now you can pay for your pickups online using your preferred payment type.
• Started displaying breakdown for Shipments with Customs charges.
• Improved the address flow experience.
• Bug fixes and enhancements.

-Adding expected delivery date for upcoming shipments
-Bug fixes and stability improvements.
• Bug fixes and enhancements

- Added support for Arabic
- Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes
• تم دعم تطبيق أرامكس باللغة العربية
• تم تطبيق بعض الإصلاحات والتحسينات.

- Added support for Arabic
- Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes
• تم دعم تطبيق أرامكس باللغة العربية
• تم تطبيق بعض الإصلاحات والتحسينات.

- Added support for Arabic
- Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes
• تم دعم تطبيق أرامكس باللغة العربية
• تم تطبيق بعض الإصلاحات والتحسينات.

- Added support for Arabic
- Miscellaneous improvements and bug fixes
• تم دعم تطبيق أرامكس باللغة العربية
• تم تطبيق بعض الإصلاحات والتحسينات.

-Adding expected delivery date for upcoming shipments
-Bug fixes and stability improvements.

• All-new App design to improve shipments tracking experience and know where your shipment on map is.
• Now you can manage your incoming shipment(s) delivery location ,date and time.
• Live track shipments: See a real–time view of courier on the map on the day of delivery.
• Smooth and secured Pay tool with full payment breakdown including delivery and customs charges.
• Send shipment from your doorstep and ship it worldwide.

• تصميم جديد لتحسين تجربة تتبع الشحنات على الخريطة.
• الآن يمكنك إدارة شحناتك الواردة وتحديد موقع التسليم واختيار التاريخ والوقت المناسب.
• التتبع المباشر: عرض مباشر لمكان المندوب على الخريطة في يوم التسليم.
• الدفع المريح والآمن لكافة تكاليف الشحن والجمارك.
• إرسال شحنة من عتبة البيت وشحنها الى جميع أنحاء العالم.
